post.body: yeah, trying to remind myself and create community around me that lives it, too :) I know you know... :)
sending you lots of calm vibes & supportive wishes 4 some time in your own blanket house 2 ride out the inexplicable sad.
wondering if i could put in request 4 TNC future book? Sark's Make Your Creative Dreams Real? Started 12 Secrets last nite wow!
love the night owl article - it explains so much about our household :)
thanks much!!
hipster makes me immediately think of "flippin" as in flippin hipsters. not sure if that is the era of hipster you were thinking :)
we keep an article at kotapress about cutters, many we find are adults now, too, difficult to witness. http://bit.ly/GFFe
I love the neti pot & use sea salt 2 & u r right it is sooo very easy 2 use. my partner still thinks it's gross though :)
I am grateful for the Devas dancing to Madonna tunes , reminding me of heART, no matter the state of the "world" http://bit.ly/gFyK
Your work is to discover your work and then with all your heART to give yourself to it. ~Buddha http://motherhenna.com/events.htm#1qb
Welcomes all around to @solsticedreamer @eleesha @GirlCanCreate @Mikexpd

Meditation is not a way of making your mind quiet. It's a way of entering quiet that's already there, buried under 50K thoughts. ~D. Chopra
